text: Hi everyone, i would like to know, if anybody have problems with the new actualization of hs, in my filtres for my pl, i have 5 stages for my pl, and i make a filtre for each stage, but i have problems, one of my filtrer is property of deal stage of the deal=lead, but for some reason deals in later stages appear in the list. if someone can help me I appreciate it, thank you.

Hi all! Happy Tuesday! I have a user in the Community looking for some help in with their mobile menu and getting elements of it to float next to each other. Any suggestions, tips or tricks would be greatly appreciated!! <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/CMS-Development/Making-Rich-Text-Boxes-Float-on-Mobile-Devices/m-p/257966>

If you have any other pieces of info you'd like the user to provide, I am happy to ask for that as well! Any feedback is appreciated! :grinning:
